god.name: Apollo
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space by forcing their Worker to the space yours just vacated.

god.name: Artemis
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may move one additional time, but not back to its initial space.

god.name: Athena
god.powerDescription: If one of your Workers moved up on your last turn, opponent Workers cannot move up this turn.

god.name: Atlas
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may build a dome at any level.

god.name: Demeter
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may build one additional time, but not on the same space.

god.name: Hephaestus
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may build one additional block (not dome) on top of your first block.

god.name: Minotaur
god.powerDescription: Your Worker may move into an opponent Worker’s space, if their Worker can be forced one space straight backwards to an unoccupied space at any level.

god.name: Pan
god.powerDescription: You also win if your Worker moves down two or more levels.

god.name: Prometheus
god.powerDescription: If your Worker does not move up, it may build both before and after moving.
